tool_description: Creates a new work item, such as a task, issue, or enhancement, and adds it to the project.

arguments.name: work_item_type
arguments.description: The type of work item to create (e.g., task, issue, enhancement)

arguments.name: title
arguments.description: The title or name of the work item

arguments.name: description
arguments.description: A detailed description of the work item
arguments.example: This task involves implementing Feature X with specific requirements.

arguments.name: assignee
arguments.description: The team member to whom the work item is assigned

arguments.name: priority
arguments.description: Specifies the priority level of the work item

arguments.name: due_date
arguments.description: Sets a due date for the work item

arguments.name: tags
arguments.description: Allows adding tags or labels for categorization
